name: Crazy Pizza Cooking Chef
description:
It’s pizza time!

Create delicious pizzas using savory Italian toppings in this exciting cooking game.
The smell of hot, fresh pizza makes everyone’s tummy rumble in hunger.

Every night can be pizza night with these homemade recipes and delicious toppings. You can make the dough following a mini game. You can roll the dough in a fun way. You can add the toppings by playing a fun mini game. You can bake pizza by following a mini game. Wow, everything you do would be so fun with the mini games. Everything with this fun cooking game.

With just a little practice you will become as good as an authentic Italian chef and a pizza master!

FEATURES:
- Simple, fun and challenging, suitable for all ages.
- A yummy pizza food cooking themed game.
- Reveal your creativity cooking real recipes.
- Animated scenes for cooking and baking.
- Crazy mini games to enjoy the cooking fun.
- Educational game that develops skills and hobby without mess.

Enjoy cheesy pizza games with this cool collection!
